did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Department of Sociology and Anthropology records, 1951-1955.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Dept. of Sociology and Anthropology.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Records for a research training seminar and various other reports.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Records of an interdepartmental research training seminar for the social sciences including proposals; reports; faculty and student notes; project data for an Elmira voting study, 1948; and interviews from a St. Joseph's Hospital, Elmira study, 1951. Also correspondence, research reports, and internal memoranda from the Digby, Nova Scotia, Stirling County Study conducted by Alexander Leighton and Garnet E. McCreary, 1952-1955

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Dept. of Sociology and Anthropology.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Department of Sociology and Anthropology records, #14-25-2209. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p: Series 1: Social Science Research Training Seminar

did.unittitle: Interdepartment research training seminar in social sciences

scopecontent.p: Includes training materials, outlines, interviews, evaluations; also, material related to Elmira Voting Study
